message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
Thank you for the offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am interested in purchasing the product for $150.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $150. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $180.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still feel that $150 is a fair price for the product. I would like to counteroffer at $160.
